mapper.select: SELECT p.user_id, a.biz_name, resv.check_in, resv.check_out, a.addr, p.pay_status, p.pay_amt, p.pay_id, c.content, p.biz_id, p.r_id, resv.resv_id FROM Accom a, Room r, Reservation resv, Payment p, Users u, Comm c WHERE u.user_id = a.user_id AND a.biz_id = r.biz_id AND r.biz_id = resv.biz_id AND resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND r.r_id = resv.r_id AND resv.r_id = p.r_id AND c.mid_code = p.pay_status AND p.resv_id = resv.resv_id AND p.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT p.user_id, a.biz_name, resv.check_in, resv.check_out, a.addr, p.pay_status, p.pay_amt, c.content, p.biz_id, p.r_id, resv.resv_id, p.pay_id as payment_id, re.pay_id as review_pay_id FROM Accom a, Room r, Reservation resv, Payment p, Users u, Comm c, Review re WHERE u.user_id = a.user_id AND a.biz_id = r.biz_id AND r.biz_id = resv.biz_id AND resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND r.r_id = resv.r_id AND resv.r_id = p.r_id AND p.pay_id = re.pay_id(+) AND c.mid_code = p.pay_status AND p.resv_id = resv.resv_id AND p.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY resv.resv_id DESC

SELECT rv.rating, rv.review_date, rv.review_content FROM Accom a, Room r, Reservation resv, Payment p, Users u, Review rv WHERE u.user_id = a.user_id AND a.biz_id = r.biz_id AND r.biz_id = resv.biz_id AND resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND r.r_id = resv.r_id AND resv.r_id = p.r_id AND rv.pay_id = p.pay_id AND p.pay_id = #{pay_id} AND p.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT a.biz_id, a.biz_name, a.addr, ri.r_img_id FROM Accom a JOIN Room r ON a.biz_id = r.biz_id LEFT JOIN Room_img ri ON r.biz_id = ri.biz_id AND r.r_id = ri.r_id WHERE r.biz_id = #{biz_id} AND r.r_id = #{r_id} AND ri.r_img_id = (SELECT MIN(ri.r_img_id) FROM room r, room_img ri WHERE ri.r_id = r.r_id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review(pay_id, room_used, rating, review_date, review_content) VALUES (#{pay_id}, 'Y', #{rating, jdbcType=INTEGER}, sysdate, #{review_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(Max(review_img_id), 0) FROM Review rv, Review_img rvImg WHERE rv.pay_id = rvImg.pay_id AND rv.pay_id = #{pay_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review_Img(pay_id, review_img_id, review_img) VALUES (#{pay_id}, #{review_img_id}, #{review_img})
mapper.select: SELECT p.user_id, a.biz_name, resv.check_in, resv.check_out, a.addr, p.pay_amt, rev.pay_id, rev.rating, rev.review_date, rev.review_content FROM Accom a, Room r, Reservation resv, Payment p, Users u, Review rev WHERE u.user_id = a.user_id AND a.biz_id = r.biz_id AND r.biz_id = resv.biz_id AND r.r_id = resv.r_id AND resv.resv_id = p.resv_id AND resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND resv.r_id = p.r_id AND p.pay_id = rev.pay_id AND p.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT p.user_id, a.biz_name, resv.check_in, resv.check_out, a.addr, p.pay_amt, rev.* FROM Accom a, Room r, Reservation resv, Payment p, Users u, Review rev WHERE u.user_id = a.user_id AND a.biz_id = r.biz_id AND r.biz_id = resv.biz_id AND resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND r.r_id = resv.r_id AND resv.r_id = p.r_id AND p.pay_id = rev.pay_id AND rev.pay_id = #{pay_id}
